Hướng dẫn :

Temp >> Portal >> mod_login

Thay toàn bộ code này vào:


<code>
    <!-- BEGIN switch_login_small -->
    <div class="dangnhapvds">
    <div><form class="vdslogin" action="{S_LOGIN_ACTION}" method="post"></div>

    <div style="float:left;"><span class="gen">Tài khoản:</span></div>
    <div style="float:right;position:relative;padding-right:5px;"><input type="text" name="username" value="{USERNAME}" size="10" maxlength="30" style="width:80px;" /></div>

    <div class="clear"></div>

    <div style="float:left;"><span class="gen">Mật khẩu:</span></div>
    <div style="float:right;position:relative;padding-right:5px;"><input type="password" name="password" size="10" maxlength="50" style="width:80px;"></div>

    <div class="clear"></div>

    <div align="center">
    <span class="gen">Đăng nhập tự động: <input type="checkbox" name="autologin" {AUTOLOGIN_CHECKED}></span>

    <input class="mainoption" type="submit" name="login" value="{L_LOGIN}">

    <span class="gensmall"><a class="gensmall" href="{U_SEND_PASSWORD}" rel="nofollow">:: {L_SEND_PASSWORD}</a></span>
    </div>


    </div>
    <!-- END switch_login_small -->

    <!-- BEGIN switch_profile -->
    <div class="thongtinthanhvienvds">
    <div class="cattitle" align="center"><b>{USERNAME}</b></div>

    <div style="margin-{DIRECTION}:5px; float:{DIRECTION};">
    <span class="genmed">{L_MESSAGES} : <strong>{NB_MESSAGES}</strong></span>

    <span class="genmed">{L_PM} : <strong>{NB_PM_UNREAD} / {NB_PM_READ}</strong></span>


    <span class="genmed">• <a href="{U_PROFILE}">Lý lịch của tôi</a></span>

    <span class="genmed">• <a href="/profile?mode=editprofile&page_profil=preferences">Tùy chỉnh giao diện</a></span>

    <span class="genmed">• <a href="/profile?mode=editprofile&page_profil=signature">Thay đổi chữ ký</a></span>

    <span class="genmed">• <a href="/profile?mode=editprofile&page_profil=avatars">Thay đổi Avatar</a></span>

    <span class="genmed">• <a href="/profile?mode=editprofile&page_profil=friendsfoes">Danh sách: Bạn / Thù</a></span>


    <span class="genmed">Avatar</span>

    <div class="avatarvds">{USERNAME_AVATAR}</div>
    </div>
    <!-- END switch_profile -->

</code>
Thêm vào Css:

<code>
    .dangnhapvds {
    position: fixed;
    background: url(http://i48.servimg.com/u/f48/13/58/60/43/kdn1010.png) bottom center no-repeat;
    width:150px;
    background-color: #fddeff;
    padding:5px;
    border:1px solid #8A8A8A;
    border-radius:0 10px 10px 0;
    left:-122px;
    bottom:20px;
    transform:rotate(270deg); -moz-transform:rotate(270deg); -webkit-transform:rotate(270deg);
    transition: all 3s ease; -webkit-transition: all 3s ease; -moz-transition: all 3s ease;
    transition-delay: 3s; -webkit-transition-delay: 3s; -moz-transition-delay: 3s;
    }
    .dangnhapvds:hover {
    left:-1px;
    transform:rotate(0deg); -moz-transform:rotate(0deg); -webkit-transform:rotate(0deg);
    transition: all 1s ease; -webkit-transition: all 1s ease; -moz-transition: all 1s ease;
    }

    .thongtinthanhvienvds {
    position: fixed;
    background: url(http://i48.servimg.com/u/f48/13/58/60/43/tttv1010.png) center left no-repeat;
    width:170px;
    background-color: #fddeff;
    padding:5px 5px 5px 30px;
    border:1px solid #8A8A8A;
    border-radius:10px 0 0 10px;
    right:-180px;
    top:70px;
    transition: all 3s ease; -webkit-transition: all 3s ease; -moz-transition: all 3s ease;
    }
    .thongtinthanhvienvds:hover {
    right:-1px;
    transition: all 1s ease; -webkit-transition: all 1s ease; -moz-transition: all 1s ease;
    }

    .avatarvds img {
    transition: all 15s ease; -webkit-transition: all 15s ease; -moz-transition: all 15s ease;
    transition-delay: 5s; -webkit-transition-delay: 5s; -moz-transition-delay: 5s;
    background-color: #FFFFFF;
    max-width:143px;
    border-radius:5px;
    margin:1px 3px 3px 1px;
    padding:3px;
    border:1px solid #d4d4d4;
    box-shadow: 3px 3px 3px #8A8A8A;
    transform:rotate(-20deg); -moz-transform:rotate(-20deg); -webkit-transform:rotate(-20deg);
    }
    .avatarvds img:hover {
    transition: all 3s ease; -webkit-transition: all 3s ease; -moz-transition: all 3s ease;
    transform:rotate(360deg); -moz-transform:rotate(360deg); -webkit-transform:rotate(360deg);
    position:relative;
    }


</code>
